SELECT xm_goods.goods_name AS goodsname, xm_goods.goods_img AS goodsimg, xm_versions.goods_price AS goodsprice, xm_goods.goods_typeid AS goodstypeid, xm_goods.id AS id, xm_color.color_name AS colorname, xm_versions.version_name AS versionname FROM xm_goods , xm_color , xm_versions WHERE xm_goods.goods_version_id = xm_versions.versions_id AND xm_goods.goods_color_id = xm_color.color_id
GROUP BY xm_goods.goods_name ORDER BY goodsprice ASC
